description: FastAPI router module for task management API endpoints, including create, list, retrieve, update, complete, and delete operations for tasks, interfacing with a SQL database.

methods.name: row_to_task_out
methods.description: Converts a SQLAlchemy row to a TaskOut object.

methods.name: create_task
methods.description: Creates a new task in the database and returns the created task.

methods.name: list_tasks
methods.description: Retrieves and returns a list of all tasks.

methods.name: get_task
methods.description: Retrieves a single task by its ID.

methods.name: delete_task
methods.description: Deletes a task by its ID.
